title: 12 spookiest NBA storylines at Halloween
description: The 2024-25 season is underway and these incidents, moments and trends are floating around as October ends.

title: 5 takeaways: Siakam's clutch 3 delivers Pacers
description: Indiana blows a 24-point lead but recovers in OT to topple the defending champs on Pascal Siakam's clutch 3-pointer.

title: NBA Fantasy: Roster advice for Oct. 30
description: RotoWire gives tips on who to play and avoid in Yahoo Fantasy.

title: Unbeaten Celtics, Cavs & Thunder in action tonight
description: The Celtics, Thunder and Cavaliers each head into Wednesday night's action with unbeaten records.

title: Raptors' Barnes (orbital fracture) out 3 weeks
description: Toronto's All-Star swingman suffered the injury in the 4th quarter of the Raptors' overtime loss to the Nuggets.

title: LeBron, Bronny both expected to play vs. Cavs
description: The father-and-son duo last suited up together in the Lakers' season-opener on Oct. 22.

title: Jazz coping with Hendricks' gruesome injury
description: Hendricks is expected to miss the rest of the season after suffering a fractured right fibula and dislocated ankle.

title: 5 takeaways: Mavs win West Finals rematch
description: Anthony Edwards scores 24 in the 1st quarter before Luka Dončić and Kyrie Irving make the Wolves relive the West Finals.

title: Gay announces retirement after 17 seasons
description: Gay announced his retirement in an open letter he wrote on The Player's Tribune, saying that he feels like 'the luckiest guy in the world.'

title: Lonzo out at least 10 days with wrist injury
description: The Bulls announced on Tuesday that Lonzo Ball suffered the injury in Monday's 126-123 win over the Grizzlies.

title: 76ers fined $100K for comments on Embiid’s status
description: Philadelphia has been fined for its public statements that were inconsistent with Embiid's health status and in violation of NBA rules.
